user.title: Electrolux Setup
user.description:
Connect your Electrolux appliances using API credentials from the Electrolux Developer Portal.

**To get API credentials:**
1. Visit {url}
2. Register and create an application
3. Obtain your API Key, Access Token, and Refresh Token

If you need help, visit the integration documentation.

reauth_validate.title: Re-authenticate Electrolux
reauth_validate.description:
Your Electrolux API tokens have expired or are invalid. Please update them with fresh tokens from the Electrolux Developer Portal.

Visit {url} to generate new tokens.

user.title: Electrolux Options
user.description:
Update your Electrolux API credentials if they have expired.

**To generate new credentials:**
1. Visit [Electrolux Developer Portal](https://developer.electrolux.one/dashboard)
2. Generate new API Key, Access Token, and Refresh Token
3. Update the fields below

**Security Note:** Access Token and Refresh Token fields are intentionally left empty. Always generate fresh tokens from the portal - never reuse or share existing tokens.

invalid_refresh_token.title: Electrolux authentication problem
invalid_refresh_token.description: The Electrolux integration failed to refresh API tokens: {message}. Please reauthenticate via the integration options to restore functionality.
